summary: REQ-82 and REQ-83 are clearly implemented (viewport meta tag updated; global overflow-x prevention + #root sizing added). The diff also includes some layout-related class changes in sections, but the requested full-screen premium gradient coverage (REQ-84) and the comprehensive audit/elimination of fixed-width/overflow-causing elements (REQ-85/REQ-86) are not fully verifiable from the provided diff summary. Several unrelated product/behavior changes were introduced (demo/anon capability changes, auth-related behavior, new UI/sections/content, confetti/music, new hooks/components).

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the premium dark gradient background covers the full screen width/height on mobile by applying the background to either body or a single full-width top-level wrapper (min-height: 100vh), without introducing horizontal overflow.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows body uses `bg-background` (solid) and individual sections (e.g., Hero/SurpriseView) apply their own gradients, but it does not clearly show a single global/top-level wrapper or body-level gradient that guarantees full-screen coverage across the entire app on mobile (especially outside the Hero/Surprise routes). App.tsx is truncated, so the presence of a global background wrapper cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Audit and fix layout containers/sections to remove non-responsive fixed width constraints (e.g., w-[400px]/w-[420px]/w-[450px]/problematic max-w) and replace with responsive patterns so mobile does not overflow.
missing_requirements.reason: Some sections show `w-full`/responsive padding updates, but the diff summary does not provide evidence of a full audit or that no fixed-width Tailwind classes remain across the main layout/sections. Many relevant files are not shown or are truncated.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (multiple sections mention 'w-full added' but no proof fixed widths removed everywhere)

missing_requirements.requirement: Identify and eliminate the specific DOM element(s) causing right-side overflow so no element exceeds viewport width on mobile, preserving existing behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: While global `overflow-x: hidden` and some defensive CSS (max-width for media) are added, the diff does not clearly document or show a targeted fix to the specific overflow-causing element(s) in the main app flow. The only explicit 'overflow' fix visible is in the Surprise confetti positioning; that may not address the original right-side black space issue across the rest of the app.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed generator access/behavior to allow anonymous users to use generator features in demo mode and added/modified quota gating flows and related UI messaging/toasts.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is strictly about mobile horizontal overflow/right-side black space and viewport/CSS/layout fixes; it explicitly lists non-goals including no new product features/behavior changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified authentication-related behaviors including automatic auth record upsert on login and post-login dashboard scroll, plus auth dialog integration changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal: 'Do not add new product features, sections, or authentication changes as part of this task.'

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/expanded Surprise mode presentation effects including a DOM-injecting confetti effect and romantic music playback.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested for a layout/overflow fix; constitutes new user-facing behavior and assets usage.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a responsive feature comparison table with horizontal scroll support in the Pricing section.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; BuildRequest forbids adding new product features/sections as part of this task.

hallucinated_features.description: Added new hooks and components for scroll-based reveal animations and reduced-motion support (Reveal wrapper, useInView, usePrefersReducedMotion).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; goes beyond the specified overflow/viewport/layout requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified FAQ content to include a new developer-facing entry about 'Continue with Google' and Internet Identity configuration notes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also conflicts with the non-goal of avoiding authentication-related changes/content as part of this task.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer changes adding new anchor links (Community/Marketplace) and attribution with UTM tracking.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; constitutes new navigation/content changes unrelated to overflow fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded on-page Legal sections (Privacy Policy/Terms/Contact) with refined layouts.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; new/expanded content sections are out of scope.
